short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: South Park wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD South Park anime background. South Park wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features of the Extension:

1. Enjoy a fresh South Park wallpaper each time you open a new tab, with an automatic shuffle feature.
2. Customize your South Park background by selecting random wallpapers or favoriting them for easy access in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize the integrated Google search bar for seamless browsing.
4. Stay connected with quick links to your email and social media accounts.
5. View the current date and time displayed automatically.
6. Utilize the new Note feature to jot down your tasks conveniently.
7. Access your most frequently visited websites with ease.
8. Manage your bookmarks effortlessly with quick access.
9. Personalize your Shortcut panel by adding your favorite websites for instant access.
10. Access Google apps quickly and efficiently.
11. Explore a variety of additional themes with a simple click on More Themes.
12. Share content effortlessly to your preferred social media platforms.
13. Access wallpapers for download instantly with a single click.
14. Dive into gaming quickly with easy access to play games.
15. Add a touch of fun to your South Park new tab experience with animated elements like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks.
